In search of Denver news?
Get it sent right to your inbox! Sign up for our free, useful and delightful newsletter today!

<style data-styled="true" data-styled-version="5.1.1">.jeOdrr{background:#F3EC65 !important;border-bottom-left-radius:3px !important;border-bottom-right-radius:3px !important;border-bottom-width:1px !important;border-color:rgba(0,0,0,.35) !important;border-left-width:1px !important;border-right-width:1px !important;border-style:solid !important;border-top-left-radius:3px !important;border-top-right-radius:3px !important;border-top-width:1px !important;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px #ffffff !important;color:#22194D !important;font-family:Montserrat !important;font-size:16px !important;font-weight:600 !important;-webkit-letter-spacing:0 !important;-moz-letter-spacing:0 !important;-ms-letter-spacing:0 !important;letter-spacing:0 !important;line-height:1 !important;margin-bottom:8px !important;margin-left:0px !important;margin-right:0px !important;margin-top:0px !important;max-width:100% !important;padding-bottom:8px !important;padding-left:12px !important;padding-right:12px !important;padding-top:8px !important;text-transform:none !important;-webkit-text-decoration:none !important;text-decoration:none !important;font-style:initial !important;width:100% !important;cursor:pointer;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr.withIcon{display:-webkit-inline-box;display:-webkit-inline-flex;display:-ms-inline-flexbox;display:inline-flex;-webkit-box-pack:center;-webkit-justify-content:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center;-webkit-align-items:center;-webkit-box-align:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center;-ms-flex-direction:row;-webkit-flex-direction:row;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr.withIcon:focus,.jeOdrr.withIcon:hover,.jeOdrr.withIcon.is-editing-hover{-ms-flex-direction:row;-webkit-flex-direction:row;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr .coloradosprings-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE{color:#22194D !important;margin-right:NaNpx !important;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr .coloradosprings-hover-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE{display:none !important;color:#000000 !important;margin-right:NaNpx !important;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr:focus,.jeOdrr:hover,.jeOdrr.is-editing-hover{background:#EFE635 !important;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr:focus .coloradosprings-hover-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE,.jeOdrr:hover .coloradosprings-hover-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE,.jeOdrr.is-editing-hover .coloradosprings-hover-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE{display:inline-block !important;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr:focus .coloradosprings-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE,.jeOdrr:hover .coloradosprings-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE,.jeOdrr.is-editing-hover .coloradosprings-submit-icon--IFNhLjXL8sqhSb9ElGgE{display:inline-block !important;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr{margin-bottom:8px !important;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr:focus.optin-loader:before,.jeOdrr:hover.optin-loader:before,.jeOdrr.is-editing-hover.optin-loader:before,.jeOdrr:focus.optin-loader:after,.jeOdrr:hover.optin-loader:after,.jeOdrr.is-editing-hover.optin-loader:after{border-color:#60656f;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr.optin-loader{position:relative;color:rgba(0,0,0,0) !important;}/*!sc*/
@-webkit-keyframes scale{from{-webkit-transform:scale(0);-ms-transform:scale(0);transform:scale(0);}to{-webkit-transform:scale(1);-ms-transform:scale(1);transform:scale(1);}}/*!sc*/
@keyframes scale{from{-webkit-transform:scale(0);-ms-transform:scale(0);transform:scale(0);}to{-webkit-transform:scale(1);-ms-transform:scale(1);transform:scale(1);}}/*!sc*/
@-webkit-keyframes opacity{from{opacity:1;}to{opacity:0;}}/*!sc*/
@keyframes opacity{from{opacity:1;}to{opacity:0;}}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr.optin-loader:before,.jeOdrr.optin-loader:after{content:'';position:absolute;border-width:2px;border-style:solid;border-radius:50%;border-color:#60656f;width:26px;height:26px;left:50%;margin-left:-13px;top:50%;margin-top:-13px;opacity:0;-webkit-animation:scale 1.8s cubic-bezier(0.165,0.84,0.44,1), opacity 1.8s cubic-bezier(0.3,0.61,0.355,1);animation:scale 1.8s cubic-bezier(0.165,0.84,0.44,1), opacity 1.8s cubic-bezier(0.3,0.61,0.355,1);-webkit-animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-iteration-count:infinite;}/*!sc*/
.jeOdrr.optin-loader:after{-webkit-animation-delay:0.9s;animation-delay:0.9s;}/*!sc*/

.fdtqEj:focus:-ms-input-placeholder{color:#b1bacb;}/*!sc*/
.fdtqEj:focus::placeholder{color:#b1bacb;}/*!sc*/

.gJlqux{position:absolute !important;cursor:pointer !important;z-index:999 !important;border:none !important;background-color:rgba(118,74,199,0.7) !important;padding-top:5px !important;padding-right:5px !important;padding-bottom:5px !important;padding-left:5px !important;margin-top:0px !important;margin-right:0px !important;margin-bottom:0px !important;margin-left:0px !important;fill:#fff !important;border-radius:100% !important;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px #33333 !important;min-width:auto !important;}/*!sc*/
.gJlqux:hover,.gJlqux.is-editing-hover{border:none !important;background-color:#fff !important;fill:#ddd !important;}/*!sc*/
.gJlqux svg{fill:inherit !important;}/*!sc*/

</style>

views.html:
Check for a confirmation email!
Then catch us in your inbox Monday - Saturday. Respond to emails with tips or questions! We'll see it and we may write back!

Learn more about us!

Welcome to Denverite!
We're your one-stop-shop for useful and delightful Denver news. Sign up for our newsletter and get the latest six days a week.

Get all the Denver news!
